info.description: API for managing shared expenses, groups, and user authentication
info.title: Qashare API

get.description: Check if the API is running

post.description: Create a new guest user by email (requires authentication). Used to add non-registered users to groups. Name will be set to [name]@domain.tld

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body format or missing required fields | BAD_EMAIL: Invalid email format

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

409.description: EMAIL_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

200.description: Returns JWT token and success message

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body format or missing required fields | BAD_EMAIL: Invalid email format

401.description: BAD_CREDENTIALS: Email or password is incorrect

500.description: Internal server error - JWT generation failed or unexpected database error

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information

200.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile information

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

404.description: USER_NOT_FOUND: The authenticated user no longer exists in the database

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body format, missing required fields, or JSON parsing error | BAD_NAME: Name contains invalid characters or is too short/long | BAD_EMAIL: Invalid email format | BAD_PASSWORD: Password does not meet requirements (e.g., too short, too weak)

409.description: EMAIL_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database or system error

post.description: Create a new expense with splits for a group. The logged in user will be set as the AddedBy user.

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body, missing required fields, or no splits provided | INVALID_SPLIT: Split totals do not match expense amount or split validation failed

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the specified group | USER_NOT_IN_GROUP: One or more users in the splits are not members of the group

404.description: GROUP_NOT_FOUND: The specified group does not exist

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

get.description: Get detailed information about an expense including splits

200.description: Returns expense details including all splits

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the group this expense belongs to

404.description: EXPENSE_NOT_FOUND: The specified expense does not exist

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

put.description: Update an existing expense (requires being group admin or expense creator)

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body or missing required fields | INVALID_SPLIT: No splits provided or split totals do not match expense amount

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: NO_PERMISSIONS: User is not the group admin or expense creator | USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the group | USER_NOT_IN_GROUP: One or more users in the splits are not members of the group

404.description: EXPENSE_NOT_FOUND: The specified expense does not exist

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

delete.description: Delete an expense (requires being group admin or expense creator)

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: NO_PERMISSIONS: User is not the group admin or expense creator | USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the group

404.description: EXPENSE_NOT_FOUND: The specified expense does not exist

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

post.description: Create a new group with the logged in user as the creator

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body format or missing required fields | BAD_NAME: Name contains invalid characters or is too short/long

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

get.description: Get all groups that the authenticated user created (is admin of)

200.description: Returns list of groups the user is admin of

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

get.description: Get all groups the logged in user is a member of

200.description: Returns list of groups the user is a member of

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

get.description: Get detailed information about a group

200.description: Returns group details including members and expenses

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the group

404.description: GROUP_NOT_FOUND: The specified group does not exist

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

get.description: Get all expenses of a group

200.description: Returns list of all expenses in the group

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the group

404.description: GROUP_NOT_FOUND: The specified group does not exist

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

post.description: Add one or more users to a group (requires group admin permission)

200.description: Returns success message and list of added member IDs

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body, missing required fields, or constraint violation

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: NO_PERMISSIONS: User is not the group admin | USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the group

404.description: GROUP_NOT_FOUND: The specified group does not exist | USER_NOT_FOUND: One or more specified users do not exist or no valid user IDs provided

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

delete.description: Remove one or more users from a group (requires group admin permission)

200.description: Returns success message and list of removed member IDs

400.description: BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request body, missing required fields, or attempting to remove self from group

401.description: INVALID_TOKEN: Authentication token is missing, invalid, or expired

403.description: NO_PERMISSIONS: User is not the group admin | USERS_NOT_RELATED: The authenticated user is not a member of the group | USER_NOT_IN_GROUP: One or more specified users are not members of the group

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected database error

get.description: Get the payment balances between the authenticated user and all other members in a group. Positive amount means other user owes you, negative means you owe them.
get.summary: Get payment settlements for a group
